document.full_text: u.s. special forces were embedded with pakistani troops on intelligence-gathering missions by the summer of 2009, confidential american diplomatic cables showed, a revelation that could hurt the pakistani military's public image.
document.title: diplomatic cables show joint u.s.-pakistan intelligence missions
lines_and_colors: u.s. special forces were embedded with pakistani troops on intelligence-gathering missions by the summer of 2009, confidential american diplomatic cables showed, a revelation that could hurt the pakistani military's public image.
